mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (p_id, m_id, top_level_comment_id, level, content, parent_nick) values (#{pinId}, #{memberId}, #{topLevelCommentId}, #{level}, #{content}, #{parentNickname})
mapper.select: SELECT c_id, comment.p_id, member.nick, top_level_comment_id, level, content, created_at, updated_at, parent_nick FROM comment INNER JOIN member ON comment.m_id = member.m_id WHERE comment.p_id = #{pinId} ORDER BY c_id ASC, level ASC
